about_the_game:
Tobii Horizon is a cutting-edge gearless head tracking software for laptops that allows you to experience a whole new level of immersion. With Tobii Horizon, take control of the in-game camera using your head movements and experience a seamless expansion of your field of view with no additional hardware. Our software detects and tracks natural head movements via laptop webcam, extending your instincts and senses in an epic selection of games. In this Playtest you'll be able to try Tobii Horizon for a number of great games including Far Cry® 6, Microsoft Flight Simulator, Euro Truck Simulator 2, DCS World, American Truck Simulator, Elite Dangerous, Arma 3, and more.

Head Tracking and Six Degrees of Freedom (6DoF)


Tobii Horizon uses advanced head tracking technology to translate real-life head movements and provides Six Degrees of Freedom (6DoF: yaw, pitch, roll, front and back, left and right, and up and down movements) in games, bringing state-of-the-art immersion to your gaming sessions.

Extended View


Tobii Horizon allows for your field of view to be massively increased thanks to your head movements, allowing for more immersive and exciting gaming experiences. Our software acts as an additional input to move the in-game camera, allowing you to focus on other inputs.

Note: This product doesn't include access to the games it support. You will have to acquire the games separately.
